title: PREMIERE: UNFOLD – PARRA FOR CUVA
body:
When one thinks of Germany the tropical waves and simmering sun of the Caribbean likely never come to mind, which makes the new video from **Parra for Cuva** all the more transcendent. The Berlin-based, German-born producer is unveiling his meditative new video for premiere track, “Unfold,” off his forthcoming album, _Majouré_, exclusively in the U.K. with CitR. While beat makers from Berlin rarely need a stamp of approval—_their sounds are almost always top notch_—we would put our money behind this one. His _wicked_ “[Wicked Games](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Vh5j7zDpy-4)” cover with Anna Naklab is still giving us chills. The video above is for anyone still loathing summer’s end and in need of a quick getaway.

Keep up with Parra for Cuva [here](https://soundcloud.com/parraforcuva)
